strategy_reasoning: This carousel uses a 'creative studio' narrative to tie together disparate updates (audio, video, bots, docs). By framing the updates as tools in a cozy workspace, we make technical changes feel tangible and exciting for creators. The 'Weekly Buzz' title establishes a recurring series format.
visual_style: Stardew Valley meets creative studio. Chunky 8-bit sprites, warm sunset lighting, soft pastel gradients with lime green (#ecf874) accents. Nostalgic, wholesome, and uncluttered.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art title screen for a weekly update. A large, chunky pixel-art wooden sign hanging from vines reads 'WEEKLY BUZZ' in a retro font. The background is a soft lime green (#ecf874) and peach pastel gradient. In the foreground, the cute pixel art bee mascot (yellow body, brown stripes, pink blush, translucent wings) is wearing a tiny painter's beret and holding a pixelated paintbrush, adding a finishing touch to the sign. Surrounding the sign are floating pixel icons of a music note, a film strip, and a gear. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
images.description: Cover image establishing the weekly update series with a creative, artistic vibe.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a retro multimedia studio. The cute pixel art bee mascot is wearing large pixelated headphones and holding a tiny movie clapperboard. She is standing next to a vintage synthesizer and a retro TV monitor showing a colorful pixel landscape. Soft lime green (#ecf874) glow coming from the equipment. The background is a warm lavender-to-cream gradient. Floating musical notes and sparkle effects around the bee. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. Text in pixel font at the bottom: 'SIGHT & SOUND'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
images.description: Visualizing the Audio API and Video generation updates as a fun creative session.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute pixel art bee mascot shaking hands (or high-fiving) with a tiny, friendly blue pixel robot (representing OpenClaw). They are standing in a cozy library garden where books (representing Docs) are neatly arranged on lime green (#ecf874) vines. The bee wears a little utility belt. A 'Play' button icon is merged into the bookshelf. Soft warm lighting, wholesome vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'NEW BESTIES'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
images.description: Representing the new Agents (OpenClaw/Polly) and the merging of Docs/Playground as a friendly meetup.
